title: @Riot Any Rioters available for a game? 999 normal wins!
body:
i posted here a few days ago to no avail and figured I may as well try again. I have been holding off playing normals for almost a week now in the hopes that a Rioter (anyone at all, doesn't need to be famous by any means) would be willing to play my first game after 999 normal wins with me. I have been playing this game for so long and it has been such a fun part of my life that I would really enjoy meeting one of you great people who made this game possible and get a chance to thank you! If there's no one who can play I completely understand, I'm just holding out hope that one day I will get to thank you.

Thanks for the consideration,
Slaeb

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=fVPEQjfI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-28T01:03:19.413+0000)
>
> Hiya! When can you play?

I just queue'd for a ranked right now! right afterwards I would love to!

> [{quoted}](name=Slaeb,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=fVPEQjfI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T01:31:02.081+0000)
>
> I just queue'd for a ranked right now! right afterwards I would love to!

I've got a big block of meetings coming up. D: I'll add you, and we can figure something out!

> I just queue'd for a ranked right now! right afterwards I would love to!

 Hey you got your game :))  Gl
